column2: "Na Jakob hun hɔn no ɔsee dɛ
column3: Nyankopɔn no dɔm nye yi: na ɔfrɛɛ bea no ne dzin Mahanaim ."

column2: "Na Jakob tuu abɔfo ma wodzii n’enyim kan kɔr no nua Esau hɔ wɔ Seir asaase do

column3: Hom nkɛse mo wura Esau dɛm; dɛ
column4: Mbrɛ w’akowaa Jakob se nye yi
column6: na makyɛr hɔ ara ma ebodu ndɛ."

column5: mpɔnkye na nkowaa nye mfonabaa: na masoma dɛ wɔmbɛka nkyerɛ mo wura

column2: "Na abɔfo no sanee baa Jakob hɔ
column4: Yɛkɔr wo nua Esau hɔ na mbom ɔnoara so reba ebehyia wo kwan
column5: na mbarimba ahaanan ka no ho."

column3: na no ho hiahiaa no. Na obuee nkorɔfo a wɔnye no nam no
column6: anantwi nye efumpɔnkɔ no hɔn mu ekuw ebien;"

column3: Sɛ Esau ba kuw kor do
column5: ɔno ikuw a ɔaka no eefi nsa."

column2: "ehumbɔbɔr nye nokwar a eyi akyerɛ w’akowaa no mennsɛ no mu biara; osiandɛ mo poma ara na medze twaa Jordan yi; na afei mayɛ ekuw ebien."

column3: gye me fi mo nua Esau nsamu: na musuro no
column5: nye enanom nye hɔn mba yi."

column4: na mama w’asefo ayɛ dɛ mpoano anhwea a no dodow ntsi wɔkan a ɔnnyɛ."

column2: "Na ɔsoɛɛ hɔ anafua no; na oyii dza ɔwɔ ne nkyɛn no mu bi dɛ ɔdze rekɛkyɛ no nua Esau;"

column5: "efumpɔnkɔ a wɔma enumfo eduasa nye hɔn mba

column2: "Na ɔdze no ekuwekuw hyɛɛ no nkowaa no nsa; na ɔsee no nkowaa no dɛ
column4: na hom mma ikuw nye ikuw ntamu mbra kwan."

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ dza odzi kan no dɛ
column3: Sɛ mo nua Esau nye wo hyia
column7: na dza wodzi w’enyim yi woana dze a?"

column3: W’akowaa Jakob dze a; ɔyɛ akyɛdze a wɔdze rekɛma mo wura Esau: na

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ dza otsia ebien no so
column4: nye hɔn a wɔka mbowakuw no do no nyinara dɛ
column6: wɔnka dɛm asɛm yi ara nkyerɛ no."

column4: hwɛ w’akowaa Jakob so dzi hɛn ekyir. Afei ɔkaa ɔsee dɛ
column5: Medze akyɛdze a odzi m’enyim yi bɔkɔ akɔdwedwe no
column6: na n’ekyir no meehu n’enyim; bi a no bo bɔdwe."

column2: "Nna akyɛdze no twaa mu dzii n’enyim: na ɔnoara dze
column3: ɔtsenaa dɔm no mu anafua no."
na ɔfaa ne yernom beenu no
na ɔmaa dza ɔwɔ nyinara twae."

column2: "Na ɔkaa Jakob no nko; na banyin bi nye no dzii aper wɔ hɔ ara ma okodur adzekyee."
"Na nyimpa no hun dɛ onndzi Jakob do konyim no
column3: nna ɔkaa n’aserɛ tokur mu; na Jakob no ndwonku huanee wɔ aperper a ɔnye no dzii no mu."

column4: na adze rekye. Na ɔsee dɛ

column3: Wo dzin dze dɛn? Na obuaa dɛ

column5: Israel: osiandɛ ɔwo enye Nyankopɔn na ɔnye nyimpa ako

column4: bɔ wo dzin kyerɛ me. Na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Na iribisa me dzin ayɛ dɛn? Na banyin no hyiraa no wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na Jakob frɛɛ bea no ne dzin Peniel; osiandɛ
"Na orutwa mu wɔ Peniel no nna ewia epue
column3: na no ndwonku a ehuan no ntsi nna ohuan n’aserɛ mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔdze bodu ndɛ da yi ara Israelmba nndzi ntsin a ɔwɔ ndwonku mu no: osiandɛ ɔkaa Jakob no ndwonku wɔ mbrɛ ntsin no wɔ no."
